title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 800.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 800.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall apply to any program
certified, funded, designated or otherwise authorized by the Office of

Addiction Services and Supports (OASAS). Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
